mapper.select: -- パスワード変更処理用（パスワードマスタ情報取得）SQLファイル SELECT MAP_ID, MAP_CUSERID, MAP_NHISTORY, MAP_CPASSWORD, MAP_DPWDDATE, MAP_CMODIFIERUSERID, MAP_DMODIFIEDDATE, VERSIONNO FROM ( SELECT MAP_ID, MAP_CUSERID, MAP_NHISTORY, MAP_CPASSWORD, TRUNC(MAP_DPWDDATE,'dd') AS MAP_DPWDDATE, MAP_CMODIFIERUSERID, MAP_DMODIFIEDDATE, VERSIONNO FROM MAST_PASSWORD WHERE MAP_CUSERID = #{username} ORDER BY MAP_NHISTORY ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{hisCnt}
mapper.update: -- パスワード変更処理用（パスワードマスタ：履歴No +1）SQLファイル UPDATE MAST_PASSWORD SET VERSIONNO = VERSIONNO + 1, MAP_NHISTORY = MAP_NHISTORY + 1 WHERE MAP_CUSERID = #{value}
